## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
unzip(zipfile = "activity.zip")
activity <- read.csv("activity.csv")
kroki <- activity$steps
dzien <- activity$date
inter <- activity$interval
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r}
head(activity)
activity2 <- activity[!is.na(activity$steps),]
agregacja <- aggregate(list(kroki = kroki), list(dzien = dzien), FUN=sum)
agregacjaNA <- agregacja[!is.na(agregacja$kroki),]

ggplot(data = agregacjaNA, aes(x=dzien, y=kroki))+geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill="steelblue")+geom_text(aes(label=kroki),vjust=-0.3, size=3.5)+theme_minimal()+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=90,hjust = 1))

```
